channel.title: RSCA Pickup bug?
channel.description: Well in RSCA if you spam click multiple items it dc's you. Can anyone tell me the files I would need to look at to fix this? Thanks.

item.title: RSCA Pickup bug?
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=521779.msg3793201#msg3793201 date=1319426132]It’s called your memory…

What if someone moves them?[/quote]What if someone changes the code, runs the server, and reverts the source files?

We’re not playing that what if game, nor are we playing the game where other people interfere with what’s going on. All methods of debugging fail when other’s are being malicious (whether they know it or not).

Read full topic

item.title: RSCA Pickup bug?
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:7, topic:419260”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=521779.msg3793243#msg3793243 date=1319428025]
Your brain processes all outcomes based on logic. The same thing when you came up with your smart ass answer.
[/quote]
What’s your point?[/quote]You sure you’re not ~T_X?

Read full topic

item.title: RSCA Pickup bug?
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote author=A Gh0st link=topic=521779.msg3792603#msg3792603 date=1319402130]Surely you of all people would know better than to make such an assumption… It’s like when you can’t find where you left your car keys and someone says to look in the kitchen. It’s just guidance to help get you on the right path.

If only there was stack traces to help you find your car keys, eh?[/quote]It’s called your memory…

Read full topic

item.title: RSCA Pickup bug?
item.dc:creator: @A_Gh0st A Gh0st
item.description:
@A_Gh0st wrote:

If he has to ask what file to look in he’s not gunna be able to fix it so we’re just wasting our time here.

Surely you of all people would know better than to make such an assumption… It’s like when you can’t find where you left your car keys and someone says to look in the kitchen. It’s just guidance to help get you on the right path.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCA Pickup bug?
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:2, topic:419260”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=521779.msg3792334#msg3792334 date=1319389254]

The packet handler that handles item pick-ups would be the obvious place to start…
[/quote]Pretty sure it had nothing to do with the packet handlers themselves. I’m almost certain it was the way the packet spamming was dealt with.

It shouldn’t be referred to as the pick-up bug then lol. I’m not familiar with RSCA’s source but surely that’d mean it’s crashable through spam-clicking objects, NPC’s, commands (without the delay protection) or any packet what-so-ever?

I don’t remember these bugs on RSCA, where did they appear from?[/quote]It pretty much only happened with that packet though, with normal game play. And it wasn’t crash-able, only you would be disconnected.

Read full topic
